ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Newbie bard leaves Kunark (was Newbie bard race to  12 )
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve only died twice in 6 levels of running up the river.  Once when I tried to help someone that was trying to make the run without a SOW and then got trained
ygData.messageBody:
I've only died twice in 6 levels of running up the river. Once when I tried
to help someone that was trying to make the run without a SOW and then got
trained by about 6 spideys at once. The second time was when I tried to use
charm against them.

They have a pretty small aggro radius, so if you just keep trucking up the
river with drum equipped and selo's playing and weave to avoid any you see,
you should have no problems.

Tomerrilin

-----Original Message-----
From: Elijah Meeker [mailto:emeeker@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 12, 2000 10:48 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Newbie bard leaves Kunark (was Newbie bard race
to 12 )


>
> Lake of Ill Omens contains plentiful mobs in all levels from
> level 3-4 thru
> 27-29. You just have to hunt in different regions.
>
> I think that mobs for your level would be just to the right
> of where the
> river hits the lake.

Hrm, maybe it was just a slow spawn night...that run through the
spiders/leaches is pretty scary though, yow. They ARE agro to younuns right?
Not a one attacked me but I figured I was just lucky.
Tsengu
